Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
[detail level 12]
XapianThe Xapian namespace contains public interfaces for the Xapian library
AutoDatabase factory functions which determine the database type automatically
BrassDatabase factory functions for the brass backend
ChertDatabase factory functions for the chert backend
FlintDatabase factory functions for the flint backend
InMemoryDatabase factory functions for the inmemory backend
RemoteDatabase factory functions for the remote backend
UnicodeFunctions associated with handling Unicode characters
ErrorAll exceptions thrown by Xapian are subclasses of Xapian::Error
LogicErrorThe base class for exceptions indicating errors in the program logic
RuntimeErrorThe base class for exceptions indicating errors only detectable at runtime
AssertionErrorAssertionError is thrown if a logical assertion inside Xapian fails
InvalidArgumentErrorInvalidArgumentError indicates an invalid parameter value was passed to the API
InvalidOperationErrorInvalidOperationError indicates the API was used in an invalid way
UnimplementedErrorUnimplementedError indicates an attempt to use an unimplemented feature
DatabaseErrorDatabaseError indicates some sort of database related error
DatabaseCorruptErrorDatabaseCorruptError indicates database corruption was detected
DatabaseCreateErrorDatabaseCreateError indicates a failure to create a database
DatabaseLockErrorDatabaseLockError indicates failure to lock a database
DatabaseModifiedErrorDatabaseModifiedError indicates a database was modified
DatabaseOpeningErrorDatabaseOpeningError indicates failure to open a database
DatabaseVersionErrorDatabaseVersionError indicates that a database is in an unsupported format
DocNotFoundErrorIndicates an attempt to access a document not present in the database
FeatureUnavailableErrorIndicates an attempt to use a feature which is unavailable
InternalErrorInternalError indicates a runtime problem of some sort
NetworkErrorIndicates a problem communicating with a remote database
NetworkTimeoutErrorIndicates a timeout expired while communicating with a remote database
QueryParserErrorIndicates a query string can't be parsed
SerialisationErrorIndicates an error in the std::string serialisation of an object
RangeErrorRangeError indicates an attempt to access outside the bounds of a container
CompactorCompact a database, or merge and compact several
DatabaseThis class is used to access a database, or a group of databases
WritableDatabaseThis class provides read/write access to a database
DocumentA handle representing a document in a Xapian database
MSetA match set (MSet)
MSetIteratorAn iterator pointing to items in an MSet
ESetClass representing an ordered set of expand terms (an ESet)
ESetIteratorIterate through terms in the ESet
RSetA relevance set (R-Set)
MatchDeciderBase class for matcher decision functor
EnquireThis class provides an interface to the information retrieval system for the purpose of searching
ErrorHandlerDecide if a Xapian::Error exception should be ignored
ExpandDeciderVirtual base class for expand decider functor
ExpandDeciderAndExpandDecider subclass which rejects terms using two ExpandDeciders
ExpandDeciderFilterTermsExpandDecider subclass which rejects terms in a specified list
KeyMakerVirtual base class for key making functors
MultiValueKeyMakerKeyMaker subclass which combines several values
SorterVirtual base class for sorter functor
MultiValueSorterSorter subclass which sorts by a several values
MatchSpyAbstract base class for match spies
ValueCountMatchSpyClass for counting the frequencies of values in the matching documents
PositionIteratorAn iterator pointing to items in a list of positions
PostingIteratorAn iterator pointing to items in a list of postings
PostingSourceBase class which provides an "external" source of postings
ValuePostingSourceA posting source which generates weights from a value slot
ValueWeightPostingSourceA posting source which reads weights from a value slot
DecreasingValueWeightPostingSourceRead weights from a value which is known to decrease as docid increases
ValueMapPostingSourceA posting source which looks up weights in a map using values as the key
FixedWeightPostingSourceA posting source which returns a fixed weight for all documents
QueryClass representing a query
StopperBase class for stop-word decision functor
SimpleStopperSimple implementation of Stopper class - this will suit most users
ValueRangeProcessorBase class for value range processors
StringValueRangeProcessorHandle a string range
DateValueRangeProcessorHandle a date range
NumberValueRangeProcessorHandle a number range
QueryParserBuild a Xapian::Query object from a user query string
RegistryRegistry for user subclasses
StemImplementationClass representing a stemming algorithm implementation
StemClass representing a stemming algorithm
TermGeneratorParses a piece of text and generate terms
TermIteratorAn iterator pointing to items in a list of terms
Utf8IteratorAn iterator which returns Unicode character values from a UTF-8 encoded string
ValueIteratorClass for iterating over document values
ValueSetMatchDeciderMatchDecider filtering results based on whether document values are in a user-defined set
WeightAbstract base class for weighting schemes
BoolWeightClass implementing a "boolean" weighting scheme
BM25WeightXapian::Weight subclass implementing the BM25 probabilistic formula
TradWeightXapian::Weight subclass implementing the traditional probabilistic formula
